 1923:                                     {core_transform,generic_pt},
 1924:                                     {parse_transform,generic_pt}]),
 1925: 
 1926:     %% Test exceptions from a core transform.
 1927:     Simple = filename:join(DataDir, simple),
 1928:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {core_transform,generic_pt}, {action, crash}]),
 1929:     {error,_,[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {core_transform,generic_pt}, {action, crash}]),
 1930: 
 1931:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {core_transform,generic_pt}, {action, throw}]),
 1932:     {error,_,[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {core_transform,generic_pt}, {action, throw}]),
 1933: 
 1934:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {core_transform,generic_pt}, {action, exit}]),
 1935:     {error,_,[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {core_transform,generic_pt}, {action, exit}]),
 1936: 
 1937:     %% Test exceptions from a parse transform.
 1938:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, crash}]),
 1939:     {error,_,[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, crash}]),
 1940: 
 1941:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, throw}]),
 1942:     {error,_,[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, throw}]),
 1943: 
 1944:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, exit}]),
 1945:     {error,_,[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, exit}]),
 1946: 
 1947:     %% Test generating errors and warnings in a parse_transform.
 1948:     {ok,simple} = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, warning}]),
 1949:     {ok,simple,[_|_]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, warning}]),
 1950:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, error}]),
 1951:     {error,[_|_],[_|_]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, error}]),
 1952:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, undefined_error}]),
 1953:     {error,[_|_],[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, undefined_error}]),
 1954: 
 1955:     ok.
 1956: 
 1957: compile_partition_warnings(Source, Opts) ->
 1958:     case compile:file(Source, [binary, return | Opts]) of
 1959:         {ok,big,<<_/binary>>,Ws0} ->
 1960:             [{_SourcePath,Ws}] = Ws0,
 1961: 
 1962:             %% Return {[ColumnWarning], [LineWarning]}.
 1963:             lists:partition(fun({{L,C},_,_}) when is_integer(L), is_integer(C) -> true;
 1964:                                ({L,_,_}) when is_integer(L) -> false
 1965:                             end, Ws);
 1966:         Error ->
 1967:             Error
 1968:     end.
 1969: 
 1970: %% Cover the erl_compile API used by erlc.
 1971: erl_compile_api(Config) ->
 1972:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1973:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1974:     Simple = filename:join(DataDir, "simple.erl"),
 1975: 
 1976:     Opts = #options{outdir=PrivDir},
 1977:     BinOpts = Opts#options{specific=[binary]},
 1978: 
 1979:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts),
 1980:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{cwd=PrivDir,includes=[PrivDir]}),
 1981:     {ok,simple,_} = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1982: 
 1983:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{specific=[dabstr]}),
 1984:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{specific=[to_core]}),
 1985:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{specific=[to_asm]}),
 1986: 
 1987:     SimpleAbstr = filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.abstr"),
 1988:     SimpleCore = filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.core"),
 1989:     SimpleAsm = filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.S"),
 1990: 
 1991:     ok = compile:compile_abstr(SimpleAbstr, "ignored", Opts),
 1992:     ok = compile:compile_core(SimpleCore, "ignored", Opts),
 1993:     ok = compile:compile_asm(SimpleAsm, "ignored", Opts),
 1994: 
 1995:     {ok,simple,<<_/binary>>} = compile:compile_abstr(SimpleAbstr, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1996:     {ok,simple,<<_/binary>>} = compile:compile_core(SimpleCore, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1997:     {ok,simple,<<_/binary>>} = compile:compile_asm(SimpleAsm, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1998: 
 1999:     NeedsDefines = filename:join(DataDir, "needs_defines.erl"),
 2000:     ok = compile:compile(NeedsDefines, "ignored", Opts#options{defines=[compile_this,{'TEST_RESULT',whatever}]}),
 2001: 
 2002:     ok = file:delete(SimpleAbstr),
 2003:     ok = file:delete(SimpleCore),
 2004:     ok = file:delete(SimpleAsm),
 2005:     ok = file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.beam")),
 2006:     ok = file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "needs_defines.beam")),
 2007: 
 2008:     ok.
 2009: 
 2010: %% Check that an ssa dump contains the pretty printed types we expect.
 2011: %% The module we compile and dump, types_pp, is crafted so it contains
 2012: %% calls to functions which have the result types we want to check the
 2013: %% pretty printer for. We check all types except for bs_context,
 2014: %% bs_matchable and the interval form of float as the first two never
 2015: %% seem to appear in result types and the latter doesn't appear in any
 2016: %% module compiled by diffable.
 2017: types_pp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2018:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2019:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2020:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, types_pp),
 2021:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "types_pp.erl"),
 2022:     Listing = filename:join(TargetDir, "types_pp.ssaopt"),
 2023:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
 2024: 
 2025:     {ok,_} = compile:file(File, [dssaopt, {outdir, TargetDir}]),
 2026:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(Listing),
 2027:     Lines = string:split(binary_to_list(Data), "\n", all),
 2028:     ResultTypes = get_result_types(Lines),
 2029:     io:format("Calls: ~p~n", [ResultTypes]),
 2030: 
 2031:     TypesToCheck = [{make_atom, "'an_atom'"},
 2032:                     {make_number, "number()"},
 2033:                     {make_float, "3.14"},
 2034:                     {make_integer, "17"},
 2035:                     {make_integer_range, "0..3"},
 2036:                     {make_nil, "nil()"},
 2037:                     {make_list, "list(any())"},
 2038:                     {make_list_of_ints, "list(integer())"},
 2039:                     {make_maybe_improper_list,
 2040:                      "maybe_improper_list(any(), any())"},
 2041:                     {make_nonempty_list, "nonempty_list(any())"},
 2042:                     {make_nonempty_improper_list,
 2043:                      "nonempty_improper_list(any(), ''end'')"},
 2044:                     {make_empty_map, "#{}"},
 2045:                     {make_map, "map()"},
 2046:                     {make_map_known_types, "#{integer()=>float()}"},
 2047:                     {make_fun_unknown_arity_known_type,
 2048:                      "fun((...) -> number())"},
 2049:                     {make_fun_known_arity_known_type,
 2050:                      "fun((_, _) -> number())"},
 2051:                     {make_fun_unknown_arity_unknown_type,
 2052:                      "fun()"},
 2053:                     {make_fun_known_arity_unknown_type,
 2054:                      "fun((_, _))"},
 2055:                     {make_unconstrained_tuple, "{...}"},
 2056:                     {make_known_size_tuple,
 2057:                      "{any(), any(), any(), any(), any()}"},
 2058:                     {make_inexact_tuple, "{any(), any(), any(), ...}"},
 2059:                     {make_union,
 2060:                      "'foo' | nonempty_list(1..3) | number(3, 7) |"
 2061:                      " {'tag0', 1, 2} | {'tag1', 3, 4} | bitstring(8)"},
 2062:                     {make_bitstring, "bitstring(8)"},
 2063:                     {make_none, "none()"}],
 2064:     lists:foreach(fun({FunName, Expected}) ->
 2065:                           Actual = map_get(atom_to_list(FunName), ResultTypes),
 2066:                           case Actual of
 2067:                               Expected ->
 2068:                                   ok;
 2069:                               _ ->
 2070:                                   ct:fail("Expected type of ~p is ~s, found ~s",
 2071:                                           [FunName, Expected, Actual])
 2072:                           end
 2073:                   end, TypesToCheck),
 2074:     ok = file:del_dir_r(TargetDir),
 2075:     ok.
 2076: 
 2077: %% Parsing for result types. Remember the last seen "Result type"
 2078: %% annotation and apply it to calls when we see them to a call when we
 2079: %% see them.
 2080: get_result_types(Lines) ->
 2081:     get_result_types(Lines, none, #{}).
 2082: 
 2083: get_result_types(["  %% Result type:"++_,"  %%    "++TypeLine|Lines], _, Acc) ->
 2084:     get_result_types(Lines, TypeLine, Acc);
 2085: get_result_types([Line|Lines], TypeLine, Acc0) ->
 2086:     Split = string:split(Line, "="),
 2087:     Acc = case Split of
 2088:               [_, " call" ++ Rest] ->
 2089:                   case string:split(Rest, "`", all) of
 2090:                       [_,Callee,_] ->
 2091:                           Acc0#{ Callee => TypeLine };
 2092:                       _ ->
 2093:                           Acc0
 2094:                   end;
 2095:               _ ->
 2096:                   Acc0
 2097:           end,
 2098:     get_result_types(Lines, TypeLine, Acc);
 2099: get_result_types([], _, Acc) ->
 2100:     Acc.
 2101: 
 2102: %% Check that the beam_ssa_type pass knows about bs_init_writable.
 2103: bs_init_writable(Config) ->
 2104:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2105:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2106:     InFile = filename:join(DataDir, "bs_init_writable.erl"),
 2107:     OutDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "bs_init_writable"),
 2108:     OutFile = filename:join(OutDir, "bs_init_writable.S"),
 2109:     ok = file:make_dir(OutDir),
 2110:     {ok,bs_init_writable} = compile:file(InFile, ['S',{outdir,OutDir}]),
 2111:     {ok,Listing} = file:read_file(OutFile),
 2112:     Os = [global,multiline,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 2113:     %% The is_bitstr test should be optimized away.
 2114:     nomatch = re:run(Listing, "({test,is_bitstr,.+})", Os),
 2115:     %% The is_bitstr test should be optimized away.
 2116:     nomatch = re:run(Listing, "({test,is_binary,.+})", Os),
 2117:     ok = file:del_dir_r(OutDir).
 2118: 
 2119: 
 2120: %% Check that an SSA listing contains pretty printed annotations, this
 2121: %% blindly checks that the expected annotation occurs the expected
 2122: %% number of times. Checking that the annotations are correctly placed
 2123: %% and contains the correct information is done in
 2124: %% beam_ssa_check_SUITE.
 2125: annotations_pp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2126:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2127:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2128:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, types_pp),
 2129:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "annotations_pp.erl"),
 2130:     Listing = filename:join(TargetDir, "annotations_pp.ssaopt"),
 2131:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
 2132: 
 2133:     {ok,_} = compile:file(File, [dssaopt, {outdir, TargetDir}]),
 2134:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(Listing),
 2135:     Lines = string:split(binary_to_list(Data), "\n", all),
 2136: 
 2137:     ResultTypes = get_annotations("  %% Result type:", Lines),
 2138:     10 = length(ResultTypes),
 2139: 
 2140:     Uniques = get_annotations("  %% Unique:", Lines),
 2141:     10 = length(Uniques),
 2142: 
 2143:     Aliased = get_annotations("  %% Aliased:", Lines),
 2144:     17 = length(Aliased),
 2145: 
 2146:     ok = file:del_dir_r(TargetDir),
 2147:     ok.
 2148: 
 2149: get_annotations(Key, [Key,"  %%    "++Anno|Lines]) ->
 2150:     [Anno|get_annotations(Key, Lines)];
 2151: get_annotations(Key, [_|Lines]) ->
 2152:     get_annotations(Key, Lines);
 2153: get_annotations(_, []) ->
 2154:     [].
 2155: 
 2156: %%%
 2157: %%% Utilities.
 2158: %%%
 2159: 
 2160: compile_and_verify(Name, Target, Opts) ->
 2161:     Mod = list_to_atom(filename:basename(Name, ".erl")),
 2162:     {ok,Mod} = compile:file(Name, Opts),
 2163:     {ok,{Mod,[{compile_info,CInfo}]}} = 
 2164: 	beam_lib:chunks(Target, [compile_info]),
 2165:     {options,BeamOpts} = lists:keyfind(options, 1, CInfo),
 2166:     Opts = BeamOpts.
 2167: 
 2168: get_unique_beam_files() ->
 2169:     get_unique_files(".beam").
 2170: 
 2171: get_unique_files(Ext) ->
 2172:     Wc = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "*"++Ext),
 2173:     [F || F <- filelib:wildcard(Wc),
 2174: 	  not is_cloned(F, Ext), not is_lfe_module(F, Ext)].
 2175: 
 2176: is_cloned(File, Ext) ->
 2177:     Mod = list_to_atom(filename:basename(File, Ext)),
 2178:     test_lib:is_cloned_mod(Mod).
 2179: 
 2180: is_lfe_module(File, Ext) ->
 2181:     case filename:basename(File, Ext) of
 2182: 	"lfe_" ++ _ -> true;
 2183: 	_ -> false
 2184:     end.
